text: Dang taiyang sheng qi shi, ni keyi kanjian taiyang pianxiang tamen de shandong de youbian; dang taiyang luoshan shi, taiyang jiu pianxiang tamen de shandong de zuobian, er tamen jiu tang zai shandong de zhongyang. Zhe shi an la de jixiang zhi yi. An la yindao shei, shei jiu huode zhengdao; ta shi shei mi wu, name, ni jue buneng wei ta zhaodao renhe pengyou lai yindao ta [zunxing zhengdao].
